related-activity.ref: 3920/A0/06/007 PCR 7 EDU QUALITY EDUCATION THROUGH CHIL

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 7.3 Child friendly learning environment according to national standards by 2014
Number of schools/class rooms established or rehabilitated
% of schools with latrines and hand washing facilities
% of primary schools with water available on a daily basis (piped or tank filled regularly, including roof water harvesting not children bringing water)
% of schools where staff/children have been trained in health, nutrition and hygiene education
Regional monitoring mechanism and legislation in place and implementation systematically tracked to ensure prohibition of corporal punishment in schools

baseline.value: No monitoring system in place in NEZ. National Education Act and teachers' Code of Conduct in NWZ in draft
